required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Estimation of Level of ERAP1 Expression in Lesional and Non Lesional Skin of Psoraitic Patients and Healthy Controls.
clinical_study.official_title: Estimation of Level of ERAP1 Expression in Lesional and Non Lesional Skin of Psoraitic Patients and Healthy Controls.

brief_summary.textblock:
A 4mm Punch biopsy is obtained from lesional and non lesional skin of 25 psoraitic patients as well as of 30 controls.
Skin biopsy from patients (psoriasis lesional and non lesional) & control will be kept in lysis solution (which contains RNAase inhibitor) for the stability of the parameter to be assessed. ERAP-1 gene expression will Research Template 5 Final Version: 8/3/2 016 be detected by quantitative real time -PCR, which include RNA extraction, cDNA synthesis & PCR.

primary_outcome.measure: Estimation of lesional ERAP1 in psoriatic skin
primary_outcome.description: DPCRetection of level of expression of ERAP 1 in lesional skin of psoriasis patients by RT-

secondary_outcome.measure: Estimation of non lesional ERAP1 in psoriatic skin
secondary_outcome.description: Detection of level of expression of ERAP 1 in non lesional skin of psoriasis patients by RT-PCR.

arm_group.description: group of 25 cases of psoriasis subjected to skin biopsy for detection of lesional and non lesional expression of ERAP1 by RT-PCR
group of 30 age and sex matched healthy controls o subjected to skin biopsy from normal skin for detection of expression of ERAP1 by RT-PCR

intervention.description: Reverse transcriptase -Polymerase Chain Reaction for ERAP1 detection

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- patients with psoriasis vulgaris
- patients over 18 years of age
- both sexes
Exclusion Criteria:
- patients on treatment for psoriasis within the last two months
- assoiciated autoimmune diseases eg SLE
- pregnancy
